description: Try our easy to follow Reuben Toasties recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Jaffle & toastie,High protein,Comfort food,Sandwich press,Quick & easy lunch,Beef
name: Reuben Toasties Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sauerkraut, mayonnaise and horseradish in a bowl and season to taste. Halve 4 pickles and set aside. Thinly slice remainder.
Preheat a sandwich press. Place 4 bread slices on a board. Top each with 2 cheese slices, sliced pickle, 25g pastrami, quarter of the sauerkraut mixture, 25g pastrami and finish with 2 cheese slices.
Spread remaining bread with half the butter and place on top, buttered-side up, pressing firmly.
Place sandwiches, buttered-side down, into press. Spread facing bread slices with remaining butter. Close sandwich press and cook for 4 minutes or until golden and cheese has melted.
Remove and cut in half. Stack halves, garnish with reserved pickles and serve.
